body_html:
Oh wow...I'm pretty dumb...You can just make them from tensorflow's functions. In case anyone needs them:

def euclidean_norm(tensor, reduction_indicies = None):
    squareroot_tensor = tf.sqrt(tensor)
    euclidean_norm = tf.sum(squareroot_tensor, reduction_indicies =  reduction_indicies)
    return euclidean_norm

def frobenius_norm(tensor, reduction_indicies = None):
    squareroot_tensor = tf.sqrt(tensor)
    tensor_sum = tf.sum(squareroot_tensor, reduction_indicies =  reduction_indicies)
    frobenius_norm = tf.sqrt(tensor_sum)
    return frobenius_norm

body:
Oh wow...I'm pretty dumb...You can just make them from tensorflow's functions. In case anyone needs them:

``` python
def euclidean_norm(tensor, reduction_indicies = None):
    squareroot_tensor = tf.sqrt(tensor)
    euclidean_norm = tf.sum(squareroot_tensor, reduction_indicies =  reduction_indicies)
    return euclidean_norm

def frobenius_norm(tensor, reduction_indicies = None):
    squareroot_tensor = tf.sqrt(tensor)
    tensor_sum = tf.sum(squareroot_tensor, reduction_indicies =  reduction_indicies)
    frobenius_norm = tf.sqrt(tensor_sum)
    return frobenius_norm
```
